Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO MENTAL HEALTH

Title: Designates records and information relating to a patient who has been deceased for a period of fifty years or longer as historic records no longer subject to privacy protections
Summary: Allows direct descendants of a patient who has been deceased for a period of fifty years or longer to access such patient's clinical records.
LawCode: Amd ยง33.16, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to allowing direct descendants of a patient who has been deceased for a period of fifty years or longer to access such patient's clinical records
